price: 19 Allah connaît aussi bien les regards furtifs que le secret des cœurs.
arabic: يَعۡلَمُ خَآئِنَةَ ٱلۡأَعۡيُنِ وَمَا تُخۡفِي ٱلصُّدُورُ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: yaʿlamu khāinata al-aʿyuni wamā tukh'fī al-ṣudūru
